nodes.description: 科西嘉分离主义者上周因抗议政府政策终止停火协议
nodes.support_text: Corsican separatists last week ended a ceasefire in protest at government policy towards the island.

nodes.description: 周六深夜发生两起炸弹袭击事件，造成周边数百米内商铺和住宅受损及窗户破碎
nodes.support_text: Anti-terrorist police were called in after two bombs went off late on Saturday, damaging shops and houses and shattering windows for hundreds of metres around.

nodes.description: 袭击现场发现一辆科西嘉被盗车辆残骸，其上带有伪造车牌和未引爆的定时装置
nodes.support_text: Near the scene of the attack police found a detonator in a burnt-out car that was stolen in Corsica and had false number plates.

nodes.description: 部分伤者因玻璃飞溅或心理创伤送医，但伤势均被评估为轻微
nodes.support_text: People were taken to hospital suffering from shock or cuts from flying glass, but their injuries were described as minor.

nodes.description: 科西嘉阿雅克肖警方使用催泪瓦斯驱散夜间集会抗议的青少年
nodes.support_text: Police in the Corsican city of Ajaccio fired tear gas on Saturday night to drive back rioting youths.

nodes.description: 反恐警察被调派（被动语态）
nodes.support_text: Anti-terrorist police were called in after two bombs went off late on Saturday, damaging shops and houses and shattering windows for hundreds of metres around.

edges.support_text: Corsican separatists last week ended a ceasefire in protest at government policy towards the island.
Anti-terrorist police were called in after two bombs went off late on Saturday, damaging shops and houses and shattering windows for hundreds of metres around.
炸弹袭击事件后反恐警察被调派
People were taken to hospital suffering from shock or cuts from flying glass, but their injuries were described as minor.
Police in the Corsican city of Ajaccio fired tear gas on Saturday night to drive back rioting youths.
警察调派后开始现场调查
